page-language-description-p1: The core objective of Shardeum is to onboard the entire world into Web3. Similar to the internet but in a more decentralized and equitable way. Language should never be a barrier here.
page-language-description-p2: That's why we are actively taking every effort to make our resources available in your native language. Don't see your language listed below? Then be the first to introduce Shardeum to your community.
page-language-contribute-to-project: That's why we are actively taking every effort to make our resources available in your native language. Don't see your language listed below? Then be the first to introduce Shardeum to your community.
